EmailTemplate.description: Updated email for first deal BW Bonus survey
EmailTemplate.name: 2018 1st Deal Survey Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Congratulations on your latest deal, you've earned a BlueWave Bonus!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We're psyched about the deal you closed! Thanks for bringing another customer closer to solar ownership.
To celebrate, we're hooking you up with your choice of a sweet S'Well water bottle or Yeti thermos to fuel your solar adventures!
How to Cash In: Let us know how we’re doing by filling out this brief survey: https://www.getfeedback.com/r/8uyaee29
Once you’ve filled out the survey, you’ll have the option to tell us what you want us to send your way.
Take the Survey!
What's next?
At Deal #3 you will earn a Patagonia bag to celebrate this milestone. We look forward to seeing you bring more homes solar power!
- All of us here at BlueWave
Questions or concerns?
Partner Support Line (888) 817-2703 PartnerSupport@bluewavesolar.com
